title: NFL ATL: Playoff picture
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Playoff picture
description:
A room full of heroes -- Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling -- comes bearing an early Christmas gift for "Around the League Podcast" fans.  The crew brings clarity to a complicated playoff picture ahead of Week 17, discusses the latest news and notes from around the NFL and offers their picks for this season's Pro Bowl.  Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL, and help the heroes by nominating them for the 2013 Stitcher Awards at stitcher.promotw.com.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
